reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Humanitarian Assistance to Yemen through WFP

description.narrative: Humanitarian food assistance to Yemen a total support of EUR 1 million. More than half 13.1 million of Yemen's population is in need of humanitarian assistance but due to the security situation and difficulties in humanitarian access 7.7 million people are targeted this year. WFP operations are focused on the most needy areas and particularly vulnerable groups such as malnourished children pregnant and lactating mothers as well as the internally displaced people. WFP is targetting a total of 4.9 million mil lion beneficiaries. WFP's refugee operation provides food assistance and nutritional supplementary feeding to 70 000 people in refgee centers and camps. WFP's financial needs for the end of the year is over 90 million U.S. dollars.
